function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of natural light can impact mental health during lockdowns","Impact":"Decreased mental well-being and increased stress for residents","Mitigation":"Increase natural light exposure through larger windows and visible transmittance","Technologies":"Use of daylight simulations and microclimate studies to optimize natural light exposure","People":"Residents in buildings or apartments","Owner":"Architects, designers, and building developers"},{"Description":"Inadequate control of indoor temperature and humidity","Impact":"Increased transmission efficiency of viruses and potential spread of contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Implement effective control of temperature and humidity within buildings and apartments","Technologies":"Use of hydronic radiant heating, electric radiant systems, and ASHRAE Standard 55-2013 for thermal comfort","People":"Residents in buildings or apartments","Owner":"Architects, designers, and building developers"}]}
